about.title: A REFRESHED NAME WITH FAMILIAR FACES
about.description: With the extensive industry knowledge and experience in the financial printing market, JAN Financial Press Limited is confident to provide world-class services for our clients in both primary market and secondary market.

services.title: Financial Processing Services
services.description: In the primary market, IPO prospectuses are the most important documents to connect issuers and investors. As a preferred financial printer, we recognize that accuracy and efficiency in typesetting and translation are crucial and our teams uphold these high standards at all times.

account.title: Account
account.description: Differentiating from our industry peers who focus solely on technology, we consider our talented staff the most treasured asset.

proofread.title: Proofread
proofread.description: Differentiating from our industry peers who focus solely on technology, we consider our talented staff the most treasured asset.

typeset.title: Typeset
typeset.description: Differentiating from our industry peers who focus solely on technology, we consider our talented staff the most treasured asset.

card2.title: Expanding Our Global Reach
card2.description: JAN Financial Press continues to grow...

card3.title: Excellence in Client Service
card3.description: Our commitment to quality earns us industry recognition and client trust.

card4.title: Sustainable Practices Initiative
card4.description: Leading the way in environmentally conscious financial printing solutions.

card5.title: Digital Transformation Success
card5.description: How we're helping clients adapt to the digital age of financial services.

card6.title: Sustainable Practices Initiative
card6.description: Leading the way in environmentally conscious financial printing solutions.

teams.description: Differentiating from our industry peers who focus solely on technology, we consider our talented staff the most treasured asset.

sales.description: Always being the very first to approach clients. The team's top priority is to listen to clients so that their needs can be identified, understood, and addressed in a timely manner.

creative.description: Creativity and passion are two big words for the team. Designers from different backgrounds always amaze clients with the boundless novelty in their design concepts.

account.description: Upon receipt of job requests from clients, AS team will take over the lead role in the coordination among departments of the company, ensuring that all the tasks will be finished on time without any hassle.

desktop.description: Experience makes an enormous contribution to accuracy and which in turn speeds up the whole typesetting process.

translation.description: As clients from different geographical regions have varied demand for translation services with different language pairs and areas of expertise, we are dedicated to working with our translation partners to accommodate our clients' individual needs.

about.title: 新名字 熟悉的面孔
about.description: 憑藉在金融印刷市場的豐富行業知識和經驗，安林財經印刷有限公司有信心為一級市場和二級市場的客戶提供世界級服務。

services.title: 金融處理服務
services.description: 在一級市場中，招股章程是連接發行人和投資者的最重要文件。作為首選的財經印刷商，我們深知排版和翻譯的準確性和效率至關重要，我們的團隊始終堅持這些高標準。

account.title: 會計
account.description: 與只注重技術的同行不同，我們認為有才能的員工是最寶貴的資產。

proofread.title: 校對
proofread.description: 與只注重技術的同行不同，我們認為有才能的員工是最寶貴的資產。

typeset.title: 排版
typeset.description: 與只注重技術的同行不同，我們認為有才能的員工是最寶貴的資產。

card2.title: 擴展全球業務
card2.description: 安林財經印刷持續成長...

card3.title: 卓越的客戶服務
card3.description: 我們對品質的承諾贏得了業界認可和客戶信任。

card4.title: 可持續發展實踐計劃
card4.description: 引領環保金融印刷解決方案的發展。

card5.title: 數碼轉型成功
card5.description: 我們如何幫助客戶適應金融服務的數碼時代。

card6.title: 可持續發展實踐
card6.description: 引領環保金融印刷解決方案的發展。

teams.description: 有別於只注重技術的同業，我們視人才為最寶貴的資產。

sales.description: 永遠走在最前線接觸客戶。團隊的首要任務是聆聽客戶的需求，確保能夠及時識別、理解並滿足客戶的要求。

creative.description: 創意和熱情是團隊的兩大特色。來自不同背景的設計師以其無限創新的設計理念，總能讓客戶感到驚喜。

account.description: 收到客戶的工作要求後，客戶服務團隊將擔任主導角色，負責協調公司各部門之間的工作，確保所有任務都能準時完成，過程順暢無憂。

desktop.description: 豐富的經驗為準確性作出巨大貢獻，從而加快整個排版過程。

translation.description: 來自不同地區的客戶對翻譯服務有著不同的語言組合和專業領域需求，我們致力於與翻譯合作夥伴合作，以滿足客戶的個別需求。

about.title: 新名字 熟悉的面孔
about.description: 凭借在金融印刷市场的丰富行业知识和经验，安林财经印刷有限公司有信心为一级市场和二级市场的客户提供世界级服务。

services.title: 金融处理服务
services.description: 在一级市场中，招股章程是连接发行人和投资者的最重要文件。作为首选的财经印刷商，我们深知排版和翻译的准确性和效率至关重要，我们的团队始终坚持这些高标准。

account.title: 会计
account.description: 与只注重技术的同行不同，我们认为有才能的员工是最宝贵的资产。

proofread.title: 校对
proofread.description: 与只注重技术的同行不同，我们认为有才能的员工是最宝贵的资产。

typeset.title: 排版
typeset.description: 与只注重技术的同行不同，我们认为有才能的员工是最宝贵的资产。

card2.title: 扩展全球业务
card2.description: 安林财经印刷持续成长...

card3.title: 卓越的客户服务
card3.description: 我们对品质的承诺赢得了业界认可和客户信任。

card4.title: 可持续发展实践计划
card4.description: 引领环保金融印刷解决方案的发展。

card5.title: 数字转型成功
card5.description: 我们如何帮助客户适应金融服务的数字时代。

card6.title: 可持续发展实践
card6.description: 引领环保金融印刷解决方案的发展。

teams.description: 有别于只注重技术的同业，我们视人才为最宝贵的资产。

sales.description: 永远走在最前线接触客户。团队的首要任务是聆听客户的需求，确保能够及时识别、理解并满足客户的要求。

creative.description: 创意和热情是团队的两大特色。来自不同背景的设计师以其无限创新的设计理念，总能让客户感到惊喜。

account.description: 收到客户的工作要求后，客户服务团队将担任主导角色，负责协调公司各部门之间的工作，确保所有任务都能准时完成，过程顺畅无忧。

desktop.description: 丰富的经验为准确性作出巨大贡献，从而加快整个排版过程。

translation.description: 来自不同地区的客户对翻译服务有着不同的语言组合和专业领域需求，我们致力于与翻译合作伙伴合作，以满足客户的个别需求。
